review: I bought this little gizmo because I kind of got tired of hooking my laptop to the older bedroom tv every time I wanted to watch Netflix.  I like that I can now simply launch netflix through my phone and control it without using too much of my phones batteries.  The other awesome plus is the ability to stream Chrome browser tabs from a computer on to the TV so you can watch videos from your computer to the TV without moving or hooking up the computer with cords.  Currently still in the Beta stage is the ability to cast your Entire computer screen to the TV.  This is a nice feature for looking at ur comptuer from a larger screen or watching videos you cannot play on chrome, but it is a bit sluggish and there is still enough lag time that it is not quite practical yet.  I'm looking forwards to improvements on that.Another sidenote is that the device does need to connected to a power source, It cannot run from just the HDMI plug in they show in the commercials.  The box comes with a charging USB you can either hook up to your TV's usb to charge or it has a outlet adapter if you prefer that.
